transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji, ma'am, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, sir.
Executive: Ji, Praveen baat kar raha hu, ma'am, IndiaMART head office se. Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Haan ji, sir, number save hai aapka. Achha hai, sir, aap bataiye.
Executive: Main bhi thik hu, ma'am. Kal woh aapne call back kiya tha na? Main ek meeting mein tha, isliye reply nahi kar paya.
Customer: Haan, haan, aur abhi yeh chal Alwar ke liye nikle hai, toh yeh raste mein honge, isliye jo profile dalna karna tha, woh ho nahi payega.
Executive: Achha, ma'am, aaj hi possible nahi hai?
Customer: Kyunki OTP vagaira chahiye honge na kuch cheezein.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Hmm, yeh ek problem ho jati hai.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Toh woh aapne kal jo incoming call kiya tha, matlab kis cheez ke liye service ke, matlab kuch leads vagaira ka issue tha, ma'am?
Customer: Nahi, leads vagaira ka issue nahi tha. Main apna
Haan. Karvana chah rahi thi aur profile jo hai woh inke number se hai main. Mera number nahi hai usme.
Executive: Achha, haan, sir ka hai.
Customer: Usme mere ko, haan, usko add karake phir process kar paungi main aage. Kal thoda free thi toh isliye socha tha yeh kaam karti hu.
Executive: Haan, maine bhi kal sir se baat kiya tha toh bole ki madam se hi baat kar lo aap ek baar wohi karwa lenge.
Executive: Woh nayi wali unit open ho gayi ma'am?
Customer: Haan, yeh nayi unit open hai na. Isme bags bhar rahe hai. Proper ban rahe hai bags.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Toh kuch nahi uska jo agar product vagaira hai woh sab hum log add kar denge aur usse bhi related phir aapko buylead aur inquiry aana start ho jayegi ma'am agar catalog mein add kar denge toh.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yeh sari cheezein ho jayegi.
Customer: Toh aapko jo pictures chahiye honge, new products ke, woh ek diagram ke through chahiye honge, weight, size, width sab cheez na?
Executive: Haan, matlab images chahiye hoga, product ke naam aur price vagaira toh aap update khud se kar lenge. Specification woh bhi aap apne site se add kar sakti hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, bas yeh rahega thoda sa system se aap connect ho jaoge, mobile se ya phir desktop vagaira se na toh main screen share karke thoda bata dunga toh aapko uska uske bare mein bhi pata chal jayega ma'am proper tarike se ki kaise use karna hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Kyunki ma'am dekho IndiaMART mein jitne jab se bhi aap log hamare saath jude ho, 2014 se kaafi purane customer hai aap hamare. But services kabhi proper use hi nahi hoti hai.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Sir, ab karna chahti hu. Hmm, hmm. Isliye number add on kariye.
Executive: Toh nahi, number kaun sa hai? Yeh Vikas sir wala jo primary number hai usko aap apna primary karna chahti hai?
Customer: 85 number wala, sir.
Executive: 85 number? Isse abhi hum baat kar rahe hai, haan.
Executive: Haan, 93 se start hai, last mein 085 hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh isko primary rakhna hai?
Customer: Haan ji, isko primary number rakhna hai.
Executive: Toh ma'am iske liye na phir wohi hai login karna padega. Matlab yeh hamare site se nahi hota, aapko karna hoga.
Customer: Hmm, isliye kal maine aapko call kiya tha ki dono saath mein hai. Mere husband kal ghar pe hi the, toh yeh kaam kal bada easily ho sakta tha.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ma'am, toh ek kaam kar sakte hai, shaam ke time aap log free rehte ho office ke baad matlab?
Customer: Main aapko message kar sakti hu us time mein drop, phir free honge. Kyunki husband Alwar jate hai, seven aur eight o'clock ho jate hai approx.
Executive: Aate aate?
Customer: Haan, inko ho jata hai time.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: One hour ka toh run hai hi Alwar se.
Executive: Ji, ma'am, ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh phir ma'am kab phir possible hai thoda sa bata dijiye.
Customer: Main WhatsApp dal deti hu aapko. Agar aaj possible ho payega aur yeh phone se connect ho payenge toh aaj kar lenge.
Executive: Haan. Hai na? Toh aaj kara denge aur aapne woh IndiaMART ka mobile application matlab login kiya? Haan, download hai. Woh login nahi kar pa rahi hu kyunki mera number add nahi hai na toh main login nahi kar pa rahi hu. Woh password mujhe inse hi lena hoga, inke paas aayega.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, woh toh password unhi ke paas jayega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na? Toh thik hai, aap ek baar main message dal deta hu. Jaise free hoiyega ma'am, bata dena mujhe de dijiyega toh yeh sari cheezein changes vagaira update vagaira woh main karwa dunga, hai na proper?
Customer: Haan ji, sir.
Executive: Haan, yeh sab kara dunga aur ma'am ek cheez aur bolna chah raha tha ki yeh jo aap naya product add kar rahi hai woh proper ready ho gaya hai na?
Customer: Haan ji, proper ready hai, sir.
Executive: Achha. Running mein hai last three months se running mein hai, haan.
Customer: Running mein hai.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Achha. Toh hamara daily ka capacity 5000 hota hai ki hum nikal hi lete hai itna toh.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: 5000?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achha. Bags, 5000 bags hum per day nikal lete hai.
Customer: Hmm, hmm, hmm. Toh thik hai ma'am jo jis cheez ke liye jaise abhi jo update karna hai catalog aapka thoda aur jo mobile number update karna hai na toh iske regarding aap jab bhi free ho please mujhe thoda sa aisa ya phir main samne se aapko ek baar message karunga toh aap mujhe timing bata dijiyega.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji, sir.
Executive: Aur yeh jo bhi iske related abhi isme ticket open ho gayi hai toh isko main close kar raha hu ma'am, thik na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh us pe ek positive feedback de dijiyega jo bhi hamara aur aapka discussion hua hai. Thik hai? For the call. Taki hum aapko help out kar paye ma'am.
Customer: Ji, sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur yeh wala jo naya product aap bata rahi hai ma'am kya naam tha uska?
Customer: Promotion bags aur packing bags. Canvas plus non-woven fabric.
Executive: Ek second. Canvas bag na?
Customer: Ji, canvas ke bags hai aur non-woven fabric.
Executive: Achha. Sirf yahi bolte hai canvas bag?
Customer: Canvas promotion bags.
Executive: Achha, canvas promotion bag na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Achha, yeh promotional bag bolte ho? Promotional kya jute bag hai ya only promotional bag?
Customer: Canvas cotton cloth hota hai laminated usme aata hai.
Executive: Achha. Kyunki main dekhiye jaise hi promotional bag dal raha hu na main Google pe bhi.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Toh aapka nearby location yeh Alwar se pehle number pe aapki company dikha de rahi hai Classic Packaging Private Limited ke naam se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aur ek company hai ma'am aap hi ke area se thoda sa dur padegi aapke yahan se 54, 54 kilometer pe hai AVS Packaging Private Limited karke.
Customer: Ji. Shayad jante honge aap AVS.
Customer: Nahi, main nahi janti abhi.
Executive: Haan, ek company hai Jaswi, Jaswi karke ek hai Manesar ki Laser Age Graphic hai, GM Crafts hai, ek Go Green New Omen bag wale hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Faridabad. Yeh log jo hai ma'am dekhiye matlab IndiaMART ki na thoda higher services use karte hai jaise IndiaMART ke trusted verified supplier hai.
Customer: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Toh inke paas jo bhi customer connect hote hai na woh zyadatar bulk wale customer zyada connect hote hai, bulk order wale.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur inko potential buyer zyada reach out karte hai ma'am inke profile pe kyunki yeh all over India deal karte hai.
Customer: Hmm, hmm, hmm.
Executive: Thik hai aur inki listing top pe dikhti hai ma'am toh jo bade buyers hote hai jinko bulk mein leta hota hai 50,000, 1 lakh approx 5 lakh, 10 lakh ka bhi order toh jo bhi product aapka yeh search karega na promotional canvas bag ke toh directly in logo ki company IndiaMART ke trusted verified supplier mein yahan pe show ho jati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ji, sir.
Executive: Toh yeh cheez hai ma'am. Ma'am thoda sa yeh kahunga ki jo bhi hum catalog aapka update karenge toh ek baar thoda sa na apni services ko thoda sa higher mein leke jaiye jahan pe hum aapko achhe buyer se matlab connect kar paye. Jahan pe hum potential buyer proper aapko de paye ma'am bulk wale.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Kyunki abhi apni services jo hai ma'am proper basic service run karti hai mini dynamic catalog.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Haan aur agar aap kyunki aap log na TrustSeal ek baar chalaye ho ma'am 2020 mein aapne TrustSeal use kiya tha.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan toh main wohi kahunga ki ma'am ek baar TrustSeal phir se use kijiye kyunki usme aapka business conversion kaafi achha milega kyunki usme kam samay mein aapko customer zyada se zyada reach out karenge.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: TrustSeal ka ma'am kya rahega na ek certificate aapki profile pe lagega aur TrustSeal ka hard copy bhi hum log share karenge aapke address pe. Aur aapki listing bhi market mein aapka jo dealing area hai ma'am only Alwar hai ya all over India?
Customer: All over India, sir.
Executive: Haan toh all over India mein bhi aapki listing thoda sa improve ho jayegi jo man lijiye ma'am jaise basic jo MDC jo aap service abhi run kar rahi hai usme for example agar seven to 800, 100 customer agar MDC chala rahe hai na toh aapka bhi promotion unhi ke beech mein chal raha hai. Lekin agar isse upar wali service mein aaoge jahan pe TrustSeal mein ma'am bheed kam hai, competition kam hai jahan pe 100, 150 ke approx supplier jude hai toh wahan pe jab aapki profile ki visibility dikhegi toh bade buyers aur potential buyer zyada aapki profile pe connect karenge. Zyada log reach out karenge ma'am toh apna traffic bhi badhega, apna conversion bhi ma'am badhega.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ji. Thoda sa yeh hai ki matlab TrustSeal mein aap move kijiye ga usme aapko better conversion hum nikalwa ke main dunga kyunki usme achha kaam karke aapke liye better dunga ma'am.
Customer: Ji. Aur aisa nahi hai ki ma'am TrustSeal pe hi matlab hamari services TrustSeal ke alawa bhi hamari services jaise star ho gaya, leader ho gaya, thik hai? Yeh sab hamare premium services hai. Agar aapko TrustSeal mein hum achha business conversion denge toh aap samne se khud bologe ki aur kya better hai services aapki IndiaMART se. Hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan. Toh pehle isko hum karte hai ma'am aap free ho kar ke bataiye mujhe main iska aapka pehle hi kaam kara deta hu proper tarike se. Kyunki ma'am dekho kaafi time se main do mahine se follow kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan, kyunki mujhe bhi yeh set karne mein thoda time lag raha tha. Jo orders already mere paas the Diwali ke time mein unko kiya run. Ab haan, mere paas flow hai filhaal main 1 lakh bags minimum nikal leti hu pure month mein. Ab isko main aur zyada aage lekar jana chahti hu.
Executive: Bilkul, ma'am.
Executive: Haan ma'am toh woh hum support karenge na uske liye toh IndiaMART family kis liye hai ma'am? Woh toh hamara kaam hi hai B2B platform mein hum aapko bade buyers, bulk wale order wale buyers provide zarur karenge. But ma'am ek request rahegi yeh sab cheezein update karane ke baad jitna hum support aapse chahenge ki aap use kare service bhale aap IndiaMART pe agar 5 lakh ki, 10 lakh ki agar investment kar diye lekin service aap use karoge nahi karoge toh uska koi matlab nahi hai. But aapko yeh hai ki service use karna padega. Definitely phir aapko achha conversion yahan se hum nikalwa ke denge.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai? Toh aapko na WhatsApp kar raha hu free ho kar ke please bataiye toh is pe connect karke video meet pe main set kara de raha hu.
Customer: Haan ji, sir.
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add her number to the profile.

- Unable to login to the IndiaMART application.

- Wants to know about the new product addition process.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to help with profile update.

- Executive offered to guide on product addition.

- Executive explained the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Executive offered a video call for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Customer will inform the executive when free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- profile update, trustseal, catalog, product addition
